question: Will Dianne Feinstein resign by July 1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if and only if Dianne Feinstein resigns from her seat as United States Senator from California by July 1, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only Dianne Feinstein resigning will suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" - e.g. if she is expelled and does not resign, it will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes."

This market will resolve according to official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Dianne Feinstein resign by July 1?

This market will resolve according to official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: MLB: Philadelphia Phillies vs. Colorado Rockies 2023-04-20
description:

question: Fight Night: Who will win - Pavlovich or Blaydes? (2023-04-22)
description:
This is a market group about UFC Fight Night, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on April 22, 2023, at UFC Apex in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

This is a market on whether Sergei Pavlovich or Curtis Blaydes will win their bout.

If Sergei Pavlovich is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Pavlovich”. If Curtis Blaydes is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Blaydes”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after April 29, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: UFC Fight Night: 2023-04-22
events.description: This is a market group about UFC Fight Night, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on April 22, 2023, at UFC Apex in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

question: Fight Night: Will Blaydes win by finish? (2023-04-22)
description:
This is a market group about UFC Fight Night, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on April 22, 2023, at UFC Apex in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

This is a market on whether Curtis Blaydes will win his upcoming bout with Sergei Pavlovich by finish. To "win by finish" means winning by KO/TKO/disqualification, submission, or any other form of stoppage. Any decision made by the judges will not count as a finish.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Curtis Blaydes wins his bout with Sergei Pavlovich by finish. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after April 29, 2023 11:59:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: UFC Fight Night: 2023-04-22
events.description: This is a market group about UFC Fight Night, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on April 22, 2023, at UFC Apex in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

question: ETH above $1,950 on April 21?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT titled 2023/04/21 12:00 in the ET timezone (referring to noon ET) has a final “Close” price of 1,950.01 or higher, or to "No" otherwise.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the ETH/USDT “Close” prices, currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT. The Binance API url for ETH/USDT may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Stephen King still have a Blue checkmark on 4/21?
description:
On April 20, Stephen King tweeted "My  Twitter  account  says  I’ve  subscribed  to  Twitter  Blue.  I  haven’t. My  Twitter  account  says  I’ve  given  a  phone  number.  I  haven’t." As of the time of this market's creation on April 20, 2023, the @StephenKing Twitter account retained a Blue checkmark.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Stephen King's Twitter account (@StephenKing) has a Blue checkmark on April 21, 2023, 12:00:00 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be Stephen King's Twitter account (https://twitter.com/stephenking), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

The Polymarket market description may be referenced as memorialization.
